Tribal Warfare?
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher Advance 2 Archive (GameBoy Advance): Miscellaneous Q&A (Post New Questions Here): Tribal Warfare?
By Nate Railsback on Friday, August 1, 2003 - 02:56 am:

I've noticed that many of the battles claim restrictions in MRA2, but I'm not sure I understand them all-- particularly, Tribe and Group. I think Tribe is supposed to be main-type monsters (or at least, it was several times for me), but what does Group mean? I thought it might be all sub-type sharers, but it's not...

By Jimeous on Friday, August 1, 2003 - 06:07 am:

Tribe Battles
You fight against monsters belonging to the same base family as your monster

Group battle
You fight monster which are the same group type.

example

Mew, Golem, Ducken, Durahan, Hengar, Arrowhead and Zan belong to the same group type named Artificial

By GoldenBoy on Friday, August 1, 2003 - 06:18 am:

This section shows all the breakdowns for tournament foes.

Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher Advance 2
Archive (GameBoy Advance): Friends and Foes: Tournament
Foes

I'll probably change Breed to Tribe at some point to make it
clearer.
